includedAssets.title: Fantastic Four
includedAssets.synopsis: Four astronauts develop superpowers after being exposed to radiation in deep space. But so does evil Dr Doom... Blazing superhero adventure with Jessica Alba.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Four astronauts develop superpowers after being exposed to radiation in deep space. But so does evil Dr Doom... Blazing superhero adventure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Four astronauts develop superpowers after being exposed to radiation in deep space. But so does evil Dr Doom... Blazing superhero adventure with Jessica Alba.

includedAssets.title: Fantastic Four: Rise Of The Silver Surfer
includedAssets.synopsis: It's clobberin' time again as the cosmically gifted quartet try to stop the global chaos whipped up by the Silver Surfer, herald of the planet-gobbling entity Galactus. With Earth under threat - and old foe Dr Doom back in town - rubbery Reed Richards (Ioan Gruffudd) and see-through Sue Storm (Jessica Alba) have no choice but to put their wedding on hold... again. Chris 'Captain America' Evans returns as Sue's firebrand brother Johnny while Michael Chiklis is back as super-strong 'Thing' Ben Grimm to make up the fearless foursome. Flame on!
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An alien threatening a worldwide wipeout stops the wedding of super sweethearts Jessica Alba and Ioan Gruffudd. Can they save the day?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's clobberin' time again as the cosmically gifted quartet try to stop the global chaos whipped up by the Silver Surfer, herald of the planet-gobbling entity Galactus. With Earth under threat - and old foe Dr Doom back in town - rubbery Reed Richards (Ioan Gruffudd) and see-through Sue Storm (Jessica Alba) have no choice but to put their wedding on hold... again. Chris 'Captain America' Evans returns as Sue's firebrand brother Johnny while Michael Chiklis is back as super-strong 'Thing' Ben Grimm to make up the fearless foursome. Flame on!

includedAssets.title: Fantastic Four Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: After an experiment in space, four astronauts gain incredible abilities from exposure to cosmic rays. Using these powers, the team take on two deadly foes as the Fantastic Four. Hit adaptation of the adventures of Marvel's first family starring Ioan Gruffudd, Chris Evans, Jessica Alba and Michael Chiklis.
